mystery_man_intro: ^MM: Why, hello there. Wanna check out my wares?

c-0: ^PR: Why not? What are you selling?

mystery_man_again: ^MM: Hi again. Wanna check out my wares?
mystery_man_soldout: ^MM: I'm unfortunately sold out at the moment so come back later.
mystery_man_sell: ^MM: I got some pills for sale. I got

c-0: ^PR: I like red things so I'll take the red one.
c-1: ^PR: I've heard blue are in fashion now so I'll take the blue one.

col_mustard_regular: ^YM: Haven't seen you around these parts lately. Where have you been?
^PR: Ah, you know. Here and there. Always busy.
^YM: Can't say I do but good for you anyways, sonny.
col_mustard_pill: ^YM: I saw that you got yourself some pills. You're sharing them?

c-0: ^PR: Sure. Here take a red pill.
^YM: Oh wow. That was some hot stuff.
^PR: Oh yeah? Now I kinda regret not trying it myself.
c-1: ^PR: No, I did not get them just to hand them away!

col_mustard_friend: ^YM: Why hello there, friend! Out doing business?
^PR: You know how it is, always something that needs to be done.
^YM: Sounds good. I'll see you around.
building_sign: ^A note hangs below the closing sign.
^If those gosh darn kids would keep their hands to themselves.
^Earlier this week when I went to get some more apples to restock the shelf
^they snuck up and stole all my eggs.
^Yesterday all the eggs were returned to the store again.
^I had to spend most of the day cleaning so I'm taking the day off today.
^If only I wouldn't have to keep them in line all the time...

shop_man_intro1: ^PR: Hey man, you won’t believe what just happened to me.
^SM: I don’t believe in anything, so what’s wrong?
^PR: Someone broke into my crib and stole all of my stuff.
^SM: Stuff? Like your belongings you say?
^PR: Yeah it’s all gone and I have no idea who did it.
^SM: See anything you say? I see many things, but not anyone else.
^SM: What to do you say? Well go look for them.
^PR: True, I can’t give up now.
^PR: But what makes you so certain?
^SM: Certain you say? I mean your bed is heavy as a mother tr….
^SM: I MEAN, a lot of things yes.
^SM: Start you say? Maybe ask the others that live here?
^PR: Right, that I will do then, thanks!
^SM: Stop by anytime if you want to ask or buy something, I got nice wares.
shop_man_intro2: ^SM: Why, hello there. Want to buy my wares?
shop_man_intro3: ^SM: So want to buy my wares?
shop_man_again: ^SM: Hi again, interested in my wares?
shop_man_sell: ^SM: What do you need? I got

b: ^SM: You need coin to buy that.

c-0: ^PR: This might come in handy, I'll buy it!

b: ^SM: I could trade it for a plant maybe.

c-0: ^PR: Never know when I need this, I'll buy it!

lamp_man_intro: ^PR: Whoa, it’s just me, the mountain prince.
^LM: Oh no… it IS actually you…
^PR: Hey what do you mean by that you old fart?
^LM: Listen here boy, what are you doing out here?
^PR: Yo control that fire of yours old man.
^PR: I’m not just out on a stroll, someone stole all mah stuff.
^PR: Yeah, everything in my mountain crib is gone.
^LM: Haven’t your parents told you to lock the door?
^PR: Haven’t YOUR parents told you about breaking in anyway?
^PR: Whatever, you haven’t seen anything about it?
^LM: Of course not, I’ve been busy keeping the forest safe from outsiders.
^PR: Ugh ye work and all that.
^LM: Now if you wanna get somewhere in life then maybe you should help me for once.
^PR: With what? And what do I get out of it?
^LM: I lost my keys somewhere on my patrol, find them and I’ll give you this lamp.
^PR: OOoo now that is a nice lamp, strikingly similar to what I had in my crib.
^PR: You got good taste, old man.
^LM: humpf, thanks I guess. Now piss off before I get angry for real.
lamp_man_again1: ^LM: Oi boy, found my keys yet?
^PR: Nope, only found an ancient bearded old man.
lamp_man_keysgot: ^PR: Yeah I found them down not far from the lake.
^LM: Well would you look at that, useful for once.
^PR: Wait what did you call me?
^LM: Here’s the lamp I promised now scram.
^PR: Aww sweet, this is going directly to the crib.
lamp_man_again2: ^LM: I Appreciate the help kid! Now that you’re here.
^LM: If you could get me some more lamp oil for my latern I would concider not cutting you down the next time you show up.
^PR: Yikes you could’ve asked nicely you stump.
lamp_man_again3: ^LM: Oi boy, that lamp oil for me?
^PR: Nope, but I did find this.
lamp_man_lampoilgot: ^LM: Fantastic! I didn't think you had it in you.
^PR: What can I say I'm full of surprises.
^LM: Who knows, now get lost before i find my axe.
^LM: Here you can take this flask of the finest homebrew in the land.
^LM: And also this chair I bought.
^LM: It's not as good as the good ol' stumps.
^LM: Now where did I put my axe?
lamp_man_again4: ^LM: Well I can't seem to find my axe, my good ol' mighty axe... Sniff
^PR: I would say that's a YOU problem old man.
^LM: Don't test your luck boy, my fists are still fit for a fight.
^PR: We both know I can run away from you before you even had the thought to do anything.
^LM: Listen here you twat, take this plant and hope the shop got an axe in stock.
^LM: If you get me a new axe we can draw a big line over all this.
^PR: The line you crossed the second you saw me?
^LM: Great, can't wait to chop... stuff... again...
lamp_man_again5: ^LM: Finally! Did he have an axe in stock?
^PR: I haven't even checked if I'm gonna be honest.
lamp_man_axegot: ^LM: Wonderful I can feel my will to live come back to me.
^PR: Now you can finally cut down some more trees gramps!
^LM: Um yes, I will cut down... trees... yes um.
^PR: Okey well that is not suspicious at all.
^LM: If you want to climb or tie someone up, take this rope as a thanks!
^PR: Now this will be useful when I finally find that burglar.
^LM: Take this drawer I bought second hand.
^PR: I need everything I can get after all.
^PR: Wait this one still got clothes in it.
^PR: Almost identical to what I like to wear.
lamp_man_again6: ^LM: Hey Prince! I actually don't feel like hurting you anymore.
^LM: All thanks to you and your helpful hand.
^PR: Oh okey? That was unexpected but greatly appreciated.
^PR: Maybe working isn't so bad after all.
^LM: Haha you're good at being a delivery boy!
^PR: Who would've known, take care you old fart.
lamp_man_again7: ^LM: You're not so bad after all.

elf_girl_intro: ^EG: Oh hello there you stallion! You’re looking like a snack today hihi.
^PR: What have I said about calling me weird names, knock it off.
^EG: Hihi calm down mr. handsome I’m just teasing you.
^PR: And I’m just trying to live my life ok?
^PR: ugh… I can’t believe I’m gonna ask you for help but I’m in a special situation here.
^EG: Oh no what have you done now naughty boy hihi?
^PR: I haven’t done anything and I’m very well behaved…
^PR: When I need to at least
^PR: Someone broke into my crib and stole everything…
^EG: I’m very sorry to hear that, you want a hug?
^EG: Maybe some snuggles to cheer you up hihi?
^PR: What I need is my things back. Have you seen anything?
^EG: Aww, I wish I could help you but if ooonly I could share you my dirty little secrets.
^EG: But maybe if you go buy me some party drink I could maybe share a secret or two hihi.
^PR: Sometimes I wonder why I put up with you.
^PR: Fine I’m gonna leave now anyway so sure, I’ll help.
^EG: Here’s some coin so you can pay that sweet nectar.
^EG: Don’t go spend it on any of your desiiires now hihi.
^PR: AAAaaaand it’s time to go BYE.
elf_girl_again1: ^EG: Already gotten the beverage? Didn't expect any less from my cute hero.
^PR: Well I haven't really gotten to it yet.
^EG: Oh how cute, you stopped by just for me you sweetie.
^PR: I better get out of here before she does something unexpected to me.
elf_girl_flaskgot: ^PR: I'm not glad you asked and somehow I actually got some.
^EG: Oh yes, I like a man that isn't afraid to take action, rawr hihi.
^PR: Better run before it's too late.
^EG: Take this lovely bed as a gift of my appreciation!
^EG: I wanted a change so I bought it and tried it out.
^EG: But he bounce wasn't there, if you know what I mean hihi.
^PR: I can just state she has no boundries. Thanks though!
elf_girl_again2: ^EG: Oh hey darling how nice to see you again in your shining crown hihi.
^EG: Oh how I am in need of a knight in shining armor, ooh.
^EG: I was simply taking a stroll by the lake when a big cat jumped at me.
^EG: If only I had a strong and brave man by my side hihi.
^PR: Get to the point miss overdramatic.
^EG: I lost my shoe... my elegant high heel shoe... Can you please find it?
^PR: I'll get right on it if you stop looking at me that way.
elf_girl_again3: ^EG: Aren't you a sight for sore eyes hihi.
^EG: Maybe you're here to see if the shoe fits the princess hihi?
^PR: Fun fact, apparently you can't find things if you don't look for them.
^EG: Aww now you're the one teasing...
elf_girl_shoegot: ^PR: Wake up from your cinderella dreams.
^PR: I did find your shoe but I ain't playing into any roleplay.
^EG: Thank you so much though, even if I expected a little more effort.
^PR: Amazing how you expected me to even do anything for you.
^EG: I think I found your radio or what you call it.
^EG: Found it at a second hand shop.
^EG: Well he told me it was second hand at least.
^PR: I can't believe my eyes. It's actually my beautiful Boombox.
^PR: I never knew someone could be this happy. Thanks!
elf_girl_again4: ^EG: Well isn't it my favourite errand boy?
^PR: The fact that you even call me that is just flat out disrespectful.
^EG: Oh don't be so overdramatic my little boo-boo hihi.
^EG: Only thing missing in my bedroom chamber is a nice sturdy rope.
^PR: Then if your house sets on fire you can escape through the window with the rope.
^EG: Oh um right. That was totally my idea my innocent cutie hihi.
^PR: I can give it a go.
^PR: Why stop now when I've gotten so far or something like that.
^EG: I can always rely on you my favourite prince hihi.
elf_girl_again5: ^EG: Oh hi I was just thinking of you.
^PR: I can't say the same unfortunately.
^EG: You found a sturdy nice looking rope for me?
^PR: Right I forgot about that hehe.
^EG: Sorry, you probably got lost in my eyes my tiny little suger cube hihi.
elf_girl_ropegot: ^PR: I think I gave the lamp oil to that old man.
^EG: Oh you silly. I will give you a break hihi.
^EG: Here take this poster, I've found a new idol now.
^PR: Oh okey I mean that's a good looking guy if you're into it you know.
^PR: I guess I'll put it on the wall
^EG: If only I had a picture of you to replace that poster on the wall hihi.
^PR: And that's my queue to leave.
elf_girl_again6: ^EG: Welcome back my dearest Prince. Here to pose for that photo I asked for?
^PR: You need help and I need to fix my crib. Bye!

crib_complete: ^PR: Man, that took some time to get ready.
^PR: It's gonna be nice to finally get some rest after this.
crib_bed: ^PR: My favourite belonging is back at last.
^PR: Who doens't like to sleep right?
crib_carpet: ^PR: Especially when I lie on it and question my existence.
crib_chair: ^PR: I was starting to wonder where I would put all of my not-dirty-enough clothes.
crib_drawer: ^PR: All my clothes are still there.
crib_lamp: ^PR: Maybe I need another window for this place.
crib_poster: ^PR: This poster isn't the one I had before the break in.
^PR: Oh well it's better than nothing.
crib_radio: ^PR: My beasty Boombox finally back at its rightful owner.
crib_no_update: ^PR: There are still a lot of stuff missing.
crib_leave: ^PR: Well, I better get back to get new stuff for mah crib.
crib_startgame: ^PR: Ah, it was fun going on that trip but it's gonna be nice to get back home to my crib.
crib_startgame2: ^PR: What!? Where is all my stuff?
^PR: Someone must've stolen them! I need to find out who.
^PR: Someone around here's gotta know what happened.
crib_endgame: ^PR: Ugh, I didn't sleep that well. The bed was crazy hard. Almost like lying on the ground.
^PR: Where did all my stuff go?
^PR: Wait a minute... I recognize that hat.
^PR: Damn it! It was him all along!
